name: Devcenter
tagline: Hire the top 1% of African Software Developers
description:
Devcenter is a smart software development marketplace to hire and manage the top 1% of African software developers to quickly build your Idea. Our process places a huge importance on experienced project architects to help you build better software. 
Through our community of 3000+ developers, Devcenter will match your idea to a quality talent under 72 hours.
